message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.

I understand that you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I've had other interested buyers and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $135 for the product. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for what you'll be getting.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still seeking a price closer to my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I've already compromised on the price, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal, such as a free warranty and a personalized setup service. I think this is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic product at a competitive price.
